src:
1242. Humanitarni tiket u podne: Boris Trbić tipuje za Udruženje “Irmos”
Naš scenarista očekuje keca u Vigu i dobitak od 187.500 dinara!

03 Nov 2019

MOZZARTOV 1242. učesnik “Humanitarnog tiketa u podne je Boris Trbić.  Naš plemeniti gost je pisac, scenarista i pedagog. Živi i radi u Australiji.
Ukoliko “prođe” dobrotvorni tiket Boris je odlučio da sumu od 187.500, 00 dinara usmeri za “Irmos”. Ako se sklopi mozaik tiketa uvećaće se ukupna suma koju je kompanija MOZZART donirala, samo u okviru Humanitarnog tiketa u podne, i iznosi fantastičnih 13.526.190,00 dinara.
Evo i šta je potrebno da “prođe”…
Već u 12.30 na Apeninima ATALANTA dočekuje KALJARI. Klub iz Bergama ima tri boda više od rivala, iza sebe ima remi sa Napolijem i ubedljiv trijumf nad Udinezeom, 7:1. I Kaljari ima sjajan niz od devet utakmica bez poraza. Poslednja je pala Bolonja sa 3:2. Gosti imaju najubedljiviju pobedu od 5:1, Atalanta bolji međusobni skor, 14:7:12.

“Da probamo sa prelazom iz jedan u jedan, uz tri plus”.

Iz Italije prelazimo na Ostrvo, EVERTON – TOTENHEM. U najavi interesantan meč u koji gosti ulaze sa boljim međusobnim skorom, 8:20:25, a najubedljivija pobeda bila je sa 6:2. Klub sa Gudisona ima dva boda manje od rivala i pobedu, poraz i trijumf u poslednja tri meča.Totenhem je pobedio Zvezdu, a izgubio od Liverpula.

“Gol, gol, tri plus”.

Stižemo i do Bundeslige, AUGZBURG – ŠALKE. Istorija je na strani gostujućeg sastava, 1:7:9. Domaći su ušli u crvenu zonu, a gosti imaju osam bodova više. Da li je Augzburg na putu izlaska iz krize jer je u minulom periodu imao pobedu i dva remija. Sa gigantom Bajernom bilo je 2:2. Šalke je sa Dortmundom remizirao pa dobio utakmicu. Poslednja dva okršaja završena su podelom bodova.

“Samo GG”.

Humanitarni tiket zaključujemo u Vigu, SELTA – HETAFE. Gosti su u sredini tabele, sa sedam bodova viška ulaze u duel. Hetafe je savladao Granadu sa 3:1 dok Selta ima tri poraza sa jednim datim golom. Međusobni skor je na strani gostujuće ekipe, 5:5:6.

“Da pokušamo sa jedinicom”.

U Australiju, gde živi i radi današnji plemeniti gost, stigla je informacija o MOZZARTOVOM društveno odgovornom poslovanju.
U kompanijskoj akciji “Sto terena za jednu igru” obnovili i svečano smo otvorili tačno 81 košarkaško igralište. Obnovili smo još jedan teren u Vrnjačkoj Banji, a poneo je ime Igora Rakočevića. Nakon toga obnovljen je teren u Beogradu, Kićan i Duda otvorili su teren, u Čast Slobodana Ivkovića.
Mozzart je donirao više od 1.000 televizora bolnicama i školama u Srbiji. Za vojne bolnice u Srbiji usmereno je čak 400 televizora… Svojevremeno, učestvovali smo u akciji “Bitka za bebe” i donirali smo veći broj inkubatora srpskim porodilištima.
Podsećamo i na MOZZART – ove plemenite kladioce u “Humanitarnom tiketu u podne” sa iznosima preko 100.000, 00 dinara.To su: Andrea Trinkijeri, Ivan Jović, Strahinja Gavrilović, Vanja Bulić, Momčilo Bajagić, Uroš Tripković, Radomir Antić, Vojin Ćetković, Vojkan Borisavljević, Zdravko Čolić, Jovan Maljoković, Nenad Stojmenović, Sara Sakradžija, Milan Caci Mihailović, Miloš Teodosić, Danica Ristovski, Dimitrije Ilić, Marko Tejić, Srđan Vasiljević, Milica Mandić, Branislav Trifunović, Predrag Miljuš, Dragana Cvijić, Boris Režak, Duško Pijetlović, Prof. Branko Đurović, Duško Nikolić, Zoran Vujičić, Milan Pavkov, Ana Joković, Ivica Šurjak, Emir Kusturica, Aleksandar Srećković, Nikola Mišković, Dejan Mišković, Zoran Višić, Ljubiša Stojanović, Milan Mačvan, Nenad Brnović, Ivan Paunić, Dejan Ristić i Milena Pavlović Čučilović…Dakle, imamo 42 člana kluba od 100.000, 00 dinara.
Važna informacija za Republiku Srpsku!
Ukoliko prođe humanitarni tiket našeg plemenitog kladioca Borisa Trbića  dobitak će biti doniran i za Dom za lica sa invaliditetom, Višegrad. Naime, kompanija MOZZART svakog dana donira i uplatu od 50 konvertibilnih maraka, a eventualni dobitak ide humanitarnoj organizaciji po izboru učesnika.
Đurđe MEČANIN/Miloš Milić
Djurdje.mecanin@mozzartbet.com
text:
1242. Humanitarian Ticket at noon: Boris Trbić tiptoes for Irmos Association
Our screenwriter expects an ace in Vigo and a profit of 187,500 dinars!

03 Nov 2019

MOZZART'S 1242th participant of the “Humanitarian Ticket at noon is Boris Trbic. Our noble guest is a writer, screenwriter and educator. He lives and works in Australia.
If the charity ticket passes, Boris has decided to direct the sum of 187,500, 00 dinars to Irmos. If a ticket mosaic is made, the total amount donated by MOZZART will be increased, only within the Humanitarian Ticket at noon, and will amount to a fantastic RSD 13,526,190.00.
Here's what it takes to "get through" ...
Already at 12.30 at the Apennines ATALANTA is welcomed by CALIARY. The Bergamo club are three points ahead of rivals, with a draw with Napoli and a convincing triumph over Udinese, 7-1. And Cagliari has a great streak of nine games without defeat. The last fell Bologna 3: 2. The guests have the most convincing win of 5: 1, Atalanta better overall score, 14: 7: 12.

"Let's try a one-to-one transition with three plus points."

From Italy we pass to the Island, EVERTON - TOTENHEM. In the announcement an interesting match in which the guests enter with better mutual score, 8:20:25, and the most convincing victory was with 6: 2. Goodison's club are two points behind rivals and win, lose and triumph in their last three matches. Tottenham beat Star and lost to Liverpool.

"Goal, goal, three plus."

We reach the Bundesliga, Augsburg - Schalke. History is on the side of the away team, 1: 7: 9. The home side have entered the red zone and the guests have eight points more. Is Augsburg on the way out of the crisis as it has had a win and two draws in the past. With the Bayern giant it was 2: 2. Schalke drew with Dortmund and won the match. The last two skirmishes ended with the division of points.

GG only.

The humanitarian ticket is concluded in Viga, SELTA - HETAFE. The guests are in the middle of the table, with seven points of excess entering the duel. Getafe defeated Granada 3-1 while Celta have three defeats with one goal. The scoring is on the side of the away team, 5: 5: 6.

"Let's try the unit."

In Australia, where today's noble guest lives and works, information about MOZZART's socially responsible business has arrived.
In the company campaign "One Hundred Grounds for One Game" we rebuilt and officially opened exactly 81 basketball courts. We renovated another terrain in Vrnjacka Banja, and it was named after Igor Rakocevic. After that, the ground in Belgrade was rebuilt, Kican and Duda opened the ground, in honor of Slobodan Ivkovic.
Mozzart has donated more than 1,000 televisions to hospitals and schools in Serbia. As many as 400 TVs are directed at military hospitals in Serbia ... In due time, we participated in the Battle of the Babies campaign and donated a large number of incubators to Serbian maternity hospitals.
We are also reminded of MOZZART's noble bookmakers in the "Humanitarian Ticket at Noon" with amounts over 100,000, 00 dinars. These are: Andrea Trinkijeri, Ivan Jovic, Strahinja Gavrilovic, Vanja Bulic, Momcilo Bajagic, Uros Tripkovic, Radomir Antic, Vojin Cetkovic, Vojkan Borisavljevic, Zdravko Colic, Jovan Maljokovic, Nenad Stojmenovic, Sara Sakradzija, Milan Caci Mihailovic, Milos Teodosic, Danica Ristovski, Dimitrije Ilic, Marko Tejic, Srdjan Vasiljevic, Milica Mandic, Branislav Trifunovic, Predrag Miljus, Dragana Cvakic, Boris Dujic, Boris Pijetlovic, Prof. dr. Branko Djurovic, Dusko Nikolic, Zoran Vujicic, Milan Pavkov, Ana Jokovic, Ivica Surjak, Emir Kusturica, Aleksandar Sreckovic, Nikola Miskovic, Dejan Miskovic, Zoran Visic, Ljubisa Stojanovic, Milan Macvan, Nenad Brnovic, Ivan Paunic, Dejan Ristic and Milena Pavlovic Cucilovic ... So we have 42 club members of 100,000, 00 dinars.
Important information for Republika Srpska!
If the humanitarian ticket of our noble bookmaker Boris Trbic passes, the winnings will also be donated to the Home for Persons with Disabilities, Visegrad. Namely, every day, MOZZART donates a payment of 50 Convertible Marks, and the eventual profit goes to the humanitarian organization of the participants' choice.
Đurđe MEČANIN / Milos Milic
Djurdje.mecanin@mozzartbet.com
